trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a name conflict occurs while generating a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 生成强类型过程中发生名称冲突时引发的异常<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The TypedDataSetGeneratorException class is not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as a class from which other classes derive standard functionality.
trans-unit.target: TypedDataSetGeneratorException 类不用于作独立组件，而应用作其他类从中派生标准功能的类。

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.TypedDataSetGeneratorException"></xref>类。
